name: Promotion Class: Cutthroat
description:
Role: Melee Damage

A dealer of death that focuses on ambushing and attacking enemies from behind.

Stat Adjustments:
Armor Penetration +10%
Attack Power +225

Traits Granted:
Axe Mastery
Dagger Mastery
Mace Maserty

Enhancements:
Kidney Shot: Now adds a Barrier when used.
In The Zone: Now grants a Movement Speed increase.
Backstab: Now counts as attacking from behind when used from any direction and has it's cooldown reduced.


WARNING: Purchasing this talent promotes you to the Vandal promotion class and prevents access to the Blackguard and Vandal promotion classes.
